snippet: An animal welfare group is donating $1 million worth of costly training mannequin to accomplish two goals: giving doctors more modern training, and saving about 1,000 animals a year.
abstract: Animal welfare group People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals is donating $1 million worth of surgical training mannequins, known as surgical simulators, to medical schools in nine countries; donation is effort to prevent young doctors from testing their skills on animals.
lead_paragraph: An animal welfare group is donating $1 million worth of costly training mannequin to accomplish two goals: giving doctors more modern training, and saving about 1,000 animals a year.

headline.main: PETA’s Donation to Help Save Lives, Animal and Human
headline.print_headline: A Donation to Help Save Human Animal Lives

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
